name: Armored Train
description: Armored Train is a procedurally generated adventure. Feel yourself in the role of an armored train engineer in an unfriendly, evil and not forgiving world. Improve your armored train, engage in trade and fighting, learn the history of this gloomy world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,10 Processor: Any Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,10 Processor: Any Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
